name: opgg-patcher
description: ad remover for the electron app of opgg
author: MidKnightXI

scripts.build: rollup -c && pkg -o opgg-patcher -t node16-win-x64,node16-darwin-x64 bundle.js && chmod 755 opgg-patcher-macos && rm -f bundle.js
scripts.build:win: rollup -c && pkg -o opgg-patcher-win -t node16-win-x64 bundle.js && rm -f bundle.js
scripts.build:win-arm: rollup -c && pkg -o opgg-patcher-win-arm -t node16-win-arm64 bundle.js && rm -f bundle.js
scripts.build:darwin: rollup -c && pkg -o opgg-patcher-macos -t node16-darwin-x64 bundle.js && chmod 755 opgg-patcher-macos && rm -f bundle.js
